RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-hudson-28-.--> <xs:schema version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://archfirst.org/bfoms/tradingservice.wsdl" xmlns:tns="http://archfirst.org/bfoms/tradingservice.wsdl" name="GetBrokerageAccountSummariesResponse" type="tns:GetBrokerageAccountSummariesResponse"/> <xs:element name="OpenNewAccount" type="tns:OpenNewAccount"/> <xs:element name="OpenNewAccountResponse" type="tns:OpenNewAccountResponse"/> <xs:element name="PlaceOrder" type="tns:PlaceOrder"/> <xs:element name="PlaceOrderResponse" type="tns:PlaceOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="TransferCash" type="tns:TransferCash"/> <xs:element name="TransferCashResponse" type="tns:TransferCashResponse"/> <xs:element name="TransferSecurities" type="tns:TransferSecurities"/> <xs:element name="TransferSecuritiesResponse" type="tns:TransferSecuritiesResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="TransferSecurities"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Symbol" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Quantity" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="PricePaidPerShare" type="tns:Money" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="FromAccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ToAccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Money" final="extension restriction"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Amount" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="Currency" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransferSecuritiesResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransferCash"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Amount" type="tns:Money" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="FromAccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ToAccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransferCashResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OpenNewAccount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OpenNewAccountResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetBrokerageAccountSummaries"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetBrokerageAccountSummariesResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountSummary" type="tns:AccountSummary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AccountSummary"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="CashPosition" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="MarketValue" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="EditPermission" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="TradePermission" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="TransferPermission" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="Position" type="tns:Position" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Position"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="AccountName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="InstrumentSymbol" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="InstrumentName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="LotId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="LotCreationTime" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:element name="LastTrade" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="MarketValue" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="PricePaid" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="TotalCost" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="Gain" type="tns:Money"/> <xs:element name="Child" type="tns:Position" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PlaceOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BrokerageAccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="OrderParams" type="tns:OrderParams" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OrderParams"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Side" type="tns:OrderSide"/> <xs:element name="Symbol" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Quantity" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="Type" type="tns:OrderType"/> <xs:element name="LimitPrice" type="tns:Money" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="Term" type="tns:OrderTerm"/> <xs:element name="AllOrNone" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PlaceOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OrderId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AddExternalAccount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ExternalAccountParams" type="tns:ExternalAccountParams" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalAccountParams"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RoutingNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AccountNumber" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AddExternalAccountResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountId" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="OrderSide"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Buy"/> <xs:enumeration value="Sell"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OrderType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Market"/> <xs:enumeration value="Limit"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OrderTerm"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="GoodForTheDay"/> <xs:enumeration value="GoodTilCanceled"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
